channel.title: Compile Problems
channel.description:
@echo off title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pause
That is one of the codes i have used and they all dont work. it either says
The System cannot find the path specified The system cannot find the path specified Press any key to continue....
Or with other ones when i compile it says at the end Finished! With 100 errors. Press any key to continue....
Someone help?

I didnt do anything to it though

item.title: Compile Problems
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

Use this, works for everyone…

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

EDIT: And you probrobly just have 100 errors…lol

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Problems
item.dc:creator: @kamakazihx kamakazihx
item.description:
@kamakazihx wrote:

@echo off
title Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe” server
pause

That is one of the codes i have used and they all dont work.
it either says

The System cannot find the path specified
The system cannot find the path specified
Press any key to continue…

Or with other ones when i compile it says at the end
Finished!
With 100 errors.
Press any key to continue…

Someone help?

Read full topic
